title: Diana: amputee
creator_credit: Janet Weaver, Rebecca Eaton and WGBH Educational Foundation
brief_description: A delightful study of a young girl who underwent a leg amputation because of a cancerous tumour. Shows how she learnt to cope with her disability and adjusted to her surroundings learning to ski on one leg at Darby Dogue Farm, Concord, Massachusetts.
